author: brycem
body:
Windows release Dockerfiles contain Alpha 14 URLs - Should be updated for Alpha15

Steps to reproduce
------------------

- https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases - Alpha 15 is available now

- View https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docker/release/nanoserver/Dockerfile

- And https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docker/release/windowsservercore/Dockerfile


Expected behavior
-----------------
Alpha 15 release URLs

Actual behavior
---------------
Alpha 14 release URLS
title: Windows release Dockerfiles contain Alpha 14 URLs - Should be updated for Alpha15
